solution_line_template: There are {other_people}+{james}=<<{other_people}+{james}={total_people}>>{total_people} people in the house
So they drink {total_people}*{cups_per_person_per_day}=<<{total_people}*{cups_per_person_per_day}={total_cups_per_day}>>{total_cups_per_day} cups of coffee a day
That means they use {total_cups_per_day}*{ounces_per_cup}=<<{total_cups_per_day}*{ounces_per_cup}={total_ounces_per_day}>>{total_ounces_per_day} ounces of coffee a day
So they use {total_ounces_per_day}*{days_per_week}=<<{total_ounces_per_day}*{days_per_week}={total_ounces_per_week}>>{total_ounces_per_week} ounces of coffee a week
